src:
Sempat Diragukan, David Da Silva Diboyong ke Markas Tira Persikabo
07 Nov 2019, 22:01 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya memboyong 18 pemain dalam lawatan ke markas PS Tira Persikabo, Sabtu (9/11/2029). Termasuk bomber asal Brasil, David da Silva.
David diboyong meskipun sebelumnya sempat diragukan karena dibekap cedera. Hanya Miswar Saputra dan Irfan Jaya yang tidak dibawa ke Bogor karena belum pulih.
"Kita bawa 18 pemain, Irfan Jaya dan Miswar kita tinggal, sedangkan David da Silva kita bawa," kata pelatih Persebaya, Aji Santoso seperti dilansir laman resmi klub.
Aji memutuskan membawa David da Silva setelah mendapat masukan dari dokter tim. Tetapi, dia belum bisa memastikan apakah yang bersangkutan bisa diturunkan.
"Kita lihat perkembangannya sampai hari Sabtu pagi, kan masih ada dua hari lagi," lanjut Aji.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Had a doubt, David Da Silva was taken to the Tira Persikabo Headquarters
Nov 7 2019, 22:01 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya brought 18 players on a visit to PS Tira Persikabo headquarters, Saturday (11/09/2029). Including Brazilian bomber, David da Silva.
David carried off although previously had doubts because of injury. Only Miswar Saputra and Irfan Jaya were not brought to Bogor because they had not recovered.
"We have brought 18 players, we are Irfan Jaya and Miswar, while we have David da Silva," said Persebaya coach Aji Santoso as reported by the club's official website.
Aji decided to bring David da Silva after receiving input from the team doctor. However, he was not sure whether he could be demoted.
"We will see the progress until Saturday morning, there are still two more days," continued Aji.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
